aboutMe.name: ariel recto
aboutMe.description: I graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology (BSIT) in 2024. I possess skills in programming across various languages and frameworks, with a strong focus on web development and mobile development. My experience includes working with technologies like Dotnet 8, React.js, and Laravel, as well as a solid foundation in networking and database management. I am passionate about leveraging technology to solve complex problems and am dedicated to continuously improving my skills in the ever-evolving IT landscape.
